A passion for music

About me

I started learning piano at the age of 17. Since then, I have been trained in piano teaching, especially for students with learning and physical difficulties, at the Verhoog School of Music in Chicago, a kind of learning laboratory. I completed an apprenticeship in piano tuning with Joseph Kahn. I’ve been working with pianos in many capacities for 15 years.

My services
